review_title: Overall, a great place to work
pros: collaborative, respectful work environment - beautiful campus, with easy access to the Washington, DC area as well as the mountains and the beach.
cons: Endowment is low and budgets are tight, even in the best of economic times. Decisions are made slowly and time to implement. Salaries not competitive.

pros: I personally and professionally grew during my time at Mary Baldwin. I have never worked with better colleagues.
cons: Currently restructuring to accommodate growth, but there are also issues of fiscal sustainability being addressed.

job_title: Writing Center Tutor in Staunton, VA
pros: Friendly! Hours are incredibly flexible, you more or less pick. Training (a class) is required so you don't go in blind.
cons: Considering a class had to be taken to become a tutor, the pay could be higher.

review_title: Great place to work great people.
job_title: Faculty Resource Coordinator in Staunton, VA
pros: The people are amazing there. I felt welcomed from day one and many were willing to help. Flexible scheduling and positive work-familybalance.
cons: Low pay very little room for advancement.

pros: Depends on department but, flexible hours, great community and environment
